about_the_game:
Create your own online shop. Choose your desired name and the category that suits you. Process new incoming orders with an interactive packing system.

Organise your warehouse according to your wishes. Order products and store them based on your own system. Expand when space becomes tight. Build different shelves for different products so that they can be stored correctly. Keep an overview of your warehouse so that you can offer your customers a smooth and fast ordering process.

Set the prices for your products yourself by analysing the market. Base your prices on customer demand and the global market. If you miscalculate, it can be expensive. If your prices are too high, customers will rate you less favourably and you will receive fewer orders. But if your prices are too low, you won't make a profit. Will you find the happy medium to satisfy customers and your bank account?

It is almost impossible to manage the work alone. It's a good thing that there are (mostly) capable employees out there who (mostly) want to make your work easier. They can do all the work for you. Re-ordering products, processing orders or working in the warehouse. You only have to count the money yourself.

The appearance of your online shop is of great importance. Who wants to buy from a site that just looks "normal"? Add shop elements such as navigation, images, product overviews or simply text. Customise every single detail exactly as you wish. Whether the colour of the text or the position of your logo. Become a web designer so that your customers feel comfortable in your online shop.
detailed_description:
Create your own online shop. Choose your desired name and the category that suits you. Process new incoming orders with an interactive packing system.

Organise your warehouse according to your wishes. Order products and store them based on your own system. Expand when space becomes tight. Build different shelves for different products so that they can be stored correctly. Keep an overview of your warehouse so that you can offer your customers a smooth and fast ordering process.

Set the prices for your products yourself by analysing the market. Base your prices on customer demand and the global market. If you miscalculate, it can be expensive. If your prices are too high, customers will rate you less favourably and you will receive fewer orders. But if your prices are too low, you won't make a profit. Will you find the happy medium to satisfy customers and your bank account?

It is almost impossible to manage the work alone. It's a good thing that there are (mostly) capable employees out there who (mostly) want to make your work easier. They can do all the work for you. Re-ordering products, processing orders or working in the warehouse. You only have to count the money yourself.

The appearance of your online shop is of great importance. Who wants to buy from a site that just looks "normal"? Add shop elements such as navigation, images, product overviews or simply text. Customise every single detail exactly as you wish. Whether the colour of the text or the position of your logo. Become a web designer so that your customers feel comfortable in your online shop.
name: Webstore Mogul

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Rise to become a webstore mogul by managing your own online shop. Set prices for your products, manage inventory, hire employees, and design your online store. With strategic decisions and effective management, you will build a successful online business.
